snippet.title: Heroes of Hammerwatch - Ultimate Edition Trailer | Nintendo Switch XBOX One | Online Co-Op Roguelite
snippet.description:
Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/heroes-of-hammerwatch-ultimate-edition-switch/
MS Store: http://microsoft.com/en-us/p/heroes-of-hammerwatch-ultimate-edition/9mvbd3k2n0pz
Crackshell and BlitWorks announce that fast-paced rogue-lite-action-rpg Heroes of Hammerwatch will release on July 30th on Nintendo Switch and on July 31st on Xbox One (PS4 release will come out soon), in its most complete form, as this Ultimate Edition comes with all the DLCs!

FEATURES
-Online Co-Op: Have up to 3 friends to join the dungeon crawling madness.
-Town upgrades: Revamp 10 different buildings to grant your heroes with various enhancements.
-9 different classes: Each one with unique stats, abilities and play styles.
-Over 100 unique items of various rarities.
-Includes all 3 DLCs: Witch Hunter, Pyramid of Prophecy and Moon Temple. 
-With many additional skills, items, areas to explore, 2 new game modes, 2 new classes and much more!
-New Game+: Get ready for a real challenge, and even if you beat it, the challenge never ends!

On a side note:

Hammerwatch receives Online Co-Op Mode on PS4 and Accessibility Improvements on All Consoles

The online co-op mode is now available in the PlayStation 4 version of Hammerwatch, allowing up-to 4 friends to jump into the adventure together and enjoy one of the most fun modes of Hammerwatch. Also, we improved the accessibility in the game load menus and added gamepad vibration feature on all consoles.

Ending score credits:

Artist: http://www.twinmusicom.org
